Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.core

Class SmartFactory

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.core.SmartFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visitable
public class SmartFactory extends Object implements Visitable
SmartFactory is a singleton class representing the whole factory.
